casebody.data:
ALLSCRIPTS HEALTHCARE, LLC
v.
ETRANSMEDIA TECHNOLOGY, INC. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017

W. Swain Wood, Attorney at Law, Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher Jackson, Attorney at Law, For Allscripts Healthcare, LLC.

Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, For Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of January 2017 by W. Swain Wood to Withdraw as Counsel for Petitioner-Appellant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
